title: Autumn Awakening (and Garden Graveyard!): Preparing for Cool-Season Planting

tasks.task: Conducting a garden cleanup and planting various crops.
subtasks: Pruning dead parts of mint plants.
Checking for new growth on mint plants.
Identifying the type of mint (apple mint) by smell.
Trimming back strawberry plants for colder weather.
Removing an eggplant plant from its bed.
Preparing the eggplant bed for new crop (carrots) by addressing nutrient and organic matter issues.
Planting carrot seeds in the prepared bed.
Clearing out a cucumber bed and saving garlic chives seeds.
Preparing a pot (piggy pot) with soil and organic matter for beetroot.
Planting beetroot seeds in the prepared pot.
Transplanting a black pepper tree into a pot.
Adding mulch and support for the pepper tree.
Additional planting of basil in mulched areas.
Checking on blue and king oyster mushrooms.
Monitoring the mushroom-growing setup with heat mats and humidifier.
